title: Front-end Developer
responsibility: Develop and maintain front-end of web applications
job_description: We are looking for a skilled front-end developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining the front-end of web applications for our clients. The ideal candidate will have experience in front-end development, a strong understanding of web technologies, and the ability to work collaboratively with other team members.
educational_description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Back-end Developer
responsibility: Develop and maintain back-end of web applications
job_description: We are seeking a talented back-end developer to help us create and maintain robust, scalable, and secure web applications. The ideal candidate will have experience in back-end development, a strong understanding of web technologies, and the ability to work collaboratively with other team members.
educational_description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Product Manager
responsibility: Lead and manage the development of new products
job_description: Acme Corp. is looking for an experienced Product Manager to lead and manage the development of new products. The ideal candidate will have experience in product management, a strong understanding of product development processes, and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
educational_description: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field

title: UX Designer
responsibility: Create user-centered design solutions for web and mobile applications
